markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Focused Cat Nap](/Feats.aspx?ID=2318) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat Nap](/Feats.aspx?ID=2314); focus pool

</column>

---

When you Cat Nap, you can also [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) as you dream of a relevant activity.
name: Focused Cat Nap
